document_data.name: ''Footsteps of Corellon''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Footsteps of Corellon''''' were enchanted [[boot]]s from [[Waterdeep]], in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The ''Footsteps of Corellon'' possessed a powerful enchantment that allowed the wearer to ''[[heal]]'' friends, with a coin toss of a chance, as they moved past the allies.
document_data.History: The ''Footsteps of Corellon'' were a gif from [[Laeral Silverhand]] to Halbenet sometime in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. She knew that the [[elf|elven]] cleric loved walking as much as they loved to dress in finery and helping people in need, so she found the prefect gift that allowed the [[moon elf]] to do all three things at the same time.
